category_description: Small doses of art. Weatherproof vinyl stickers from independent artists.
category_vibe: Tiny treasures to stick on your world.

products.name: Third Eye Holographic
products.description: A stylized third eye that shifts colors as you move—purple, blue, gold. Weatherproof vinyl that sticks to laptops, water bottles, guitars, whatever needs protection.
products.tone_hint: Fun, mystical, practical. This is art you can put anywhere.

products.name: "Stay Cosmic" Script
products.description: Our tagline in flowing script with little stars. A reminder to keep your head in the clouds and your feet on the ground. Goes perfectly on a journal or car bumper.
products.tone_hint: This is our vibe in sticker form. Simple, meaningful, brand-building.

products.name: Mushroom Trio
products.description: Three red-capped mushrooms with white spots, surrounded by tiny stars. Whimsical and slightly mystical—these mushrooms have seen some things.
products.tone_hint: Playful but with depth. Mushrooms are medicine, decomposers, connectors. But also they're just cute.

products.name: Crystal Cluster
products.description: A cluster of amethyst crystals rendered in geometric detail. Purple gradients catch the light. For the rock hounds and energy workers.
products.tone_hint: Pretty and precise. Whether you believe in crystal energy or just like shiny rocks, this sticker delivers.

products.name: Peace Hand - Retro
products.description: The classic peace sign in groovy 70s colors—orange, yellow, brown. Vintage vibes for modern times. Peace never goes out of style.
products.tone_hint: Nostalgic but not dated. Peace signs are forever relevant.

products.name: Ouroboros - Snake Eating Tail
products.description: The ancient symbol of cycles, renewal, infinity. A detailed snake in black and gold, forming a perfect circle. For alchemists and philosophers.
products.tone_hint: Deeply symbolic. This is for people who think in archetypes and cycles.

products.name: Alien Peace Cat
products.description: A cat with huge eyes, throwing up a peace sign. Is it an alien? Is it enlightened? Does it matter? This sticker sparks joy and questions.
products.tone_hint: Weird in the best way. This is for people with a sense of humor about the mysteries of existence.

products.name: Sun and Moon - Balance
products.description: A sun and moon sharing the same circle, yin and yang style. Gold and silver foil make them shine. The eternal dance of opposites.
products.tone_hint: Classic symbol, beautifully executed. Day and night, light and dark, forever in balance.

products.name: "Good Vibes Only" Neon
products.description: The phrase in neon-style lettering with a pink and blue glow effect. A reminder to protect your energy and choose positivity.
products.tone_hint: Optimistic without being preachy. Everyone needs a vibe check sometimes.

products.name: Mandala Mini - Black & White
products.description: A tiny, intricate mandala in stark black and white. Small enough for a phone case, detailed enough to get lost in. Zen in under 2 inches.
products.tone_hint: Proof that good things come in small packages. This is for minimalists with maximalist souls.
